explanation: [0-0] Against a blue background, the center of the screen shows a cartoon image of a belly. On the left, a right hand holds an empty glass, and on the right is a white box. The upper part is flesh-colored with an upward arc.

[0-2] First, the camera zooms out, and a colorful logo appears above. The logo includes a cartoon monkey head, to the right of which are three white squares with the letters "Ba", "Li", and "Ta" written on them in blue, green, and red respectively. A monkey stands in the middle of the screen, and a wooden table appears on the right. The monkey pours milk into the glass and then turns to put the milk carton on the table.

[0-2] First, the camera zooms out, and a colorful logo appears above. The logo includes a cartoon monkey head, to the right of which are three white squares with the letters "Ba", "Li", and "Ta" written on them in blue, green, and red respectively. A monkey stands in the middle of the screen, and a wooden table appears on the right. The monkey pours milk into the glass and then turns to put the milk carton on the table.

[2-9] Then the monkey turns its head, picks up the glass, and drinks the milk, leaving a milk stain around its mouth. The monkey wipes its mouth with its left hand and then turns sideways to place the glass on the table. Afterward, the background changes to orange and yellow lines converging towards the center from the four corners. The monkey raises its right hand, tilting its head and smiling to the left, then turns back to the front, and the background switches back to blue.

[9-19] Finally, the camera pans to the right, showing a red cartoon parrot sitting by the table with an empty glass on the table in front of it. The parrot moves the empty glass to the side of the table with its right wing. The monkey walks in from the left holding the milk carton in its left hand, fills the glass with milk, and then the parrot picks up the glass with its right wing and finishes the milk. The monkey watches the parrot open its mouth, leaving a milk stain around it. The parrot wipes its mouth with its left wing, sits back in the chair, pats its belly with both wings, then turns to the front and raises its right wing, with four yellow dynamic stars appearing around the wing. The stars disappear, and the image freezes.
